name: Pogo Go Up
description:
Dev League Round 5: 

24 hour Jam

Theme:  The Only Way is Up

Bounce a pogo stick up through the markers all the way to the top of the screen; can be beat in less than 30 seconds.

Left/Right arrow keys or A/D to rotate stick.

Each marker awards points times a multiplier. Each bounce reduces your multiplier.  Passing through a marker also can greatly increase your multiplier.  Make it all the way through with the fewest bounces.

This is a mechanical clone of the GTMK 2020 submission 'Cleaning the System' by @Nashiek.  With the addition of a score mechanic.

https://itch.io/jam/gmtk-2020/rate/695696

KNOWN BUGS:

The multiplier doesn't reset on repeated plays, so you can get a huge score.
